text: Good news, DC Comics fans. The first look at Aquaman super - villain Black Manta is a pretty faithful adaptation of the comics. The upcoming blockbuster, which Warner Bros bosses are already promising will set the DCEU back on the right path, has unveiled three new images ahead of the film's launch later this year. The first of which is The Greatest Showman and The Handmaid's Tale actor Yahya Abdul - Mateen II as David Kane, a bounty and treasure hunter who uses the alias Black Manta. Director James Wan describes the live - action version of Black Manta as ` ` part mercenary but full - time pirate'', which is a pretty spot - on description of the comics version of the character.
